questions.question: What has the study of fossils allowed scientists to do?

choices.answer: describe past environments
analyze the chemical composition of rocks
study present ocean temperatures
predict which organisms will become extinct

choices.answer: its age compared with the ages of other rocks.
the number of years since the rock formed.
less than the age of the fossils the rock contains.
its age based on how much carbon-14 the rock contains.

choices.answer: True
